data.name: EVIL BELOW
data.detailed_description:
Disclaimer: This game makes use of your microphone to complete puzzles and combat.



You wake up. Your head hurts, your vision is distorted and you are alone.
Whispers call your name from Below.
The Wolf will not let you leave and your only way is down.



EVIL BELOW is a first-person horror adventure game that combines horror elements with unique puzzle solving and stealth.

The game centers around a mother searching for her son in a semi-openworld landscape filled with never-ending forests, abandoned villages and claustrophobic caverns.
In this world, several creatures made these lands their territory, and you are their prey.





  • Explore 7 distinct interconnected areas seamlessly without loading screens
  • Solve puzzles using your microphone
  • Manage your inventory and choose which path to take
  • An arsenal of weapons that will help you keep situations under control
  • A diverse cast of characters that will help you uncover the truth





The original proof of concept is still available for everyone to play. The 'Legacy Demo' doesn't represent the current state of the game but serves as a distant memory, still available for any curious gamer to mess around.

DOWNLOAD IT HERE

DOWNLOAD IT HERE
data.short_description: Take the role of a mother searching for her child in a mysterious world filled with dark creatures blinded by faith and greed. Prepare to run, hide, kill and survive.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Finnish, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Arabic
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD® FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 960 Ti / Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone is required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD® FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 1660TI / AMD RADEON RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone is required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.5gz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics
  • Additional Notes: Microphone is required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.5gz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Pro Vega 16
  • Additional Notes: Microphone is required

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
